text:
@KagutaMuseveni @MinofHealthUG Come to think about it H. E @KagutaMuseveni, the longest time #COVID19 lasts on a surface(plastic) is 9days, if only we could have a total lock down of 2 weeks and see how we can contain the disease.

#unpopularopinion

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
